data: adobe saloon | narrow crooked streets of old Las Vegas

Exactly twenty minutes after young Benton dismounted from his big rangy black before the door of a low adobe saloon that fronted upon one of the narrow crooked streets of old Las Vegas, he glanced into the eyes of the thin-lipped croupier and laughed.

The Texan
A Story of the Cattle Country
